title: Six Trips with an Infamous Playboy
description: Barron Baylor is famous for his womanizing and wild behavior. And now it’s my job to tame him.Flamboyant billionaire. Drop-dead gorgeous playboy. Controversial prankster of Instagram. Barron Baylor lives his life largely and answers to no one.Except me.The Baylor family is sick of his antics. And because I’m the most unflappable social media professional they know, they’ve hired me to “rebrand” him and turn him into a marketing asset for Baylor Hotels. Against his will, of course.Barron is determined to undermine me and turn this job into my worst nightmare. But six stays at luxury European Baylor hotels might just help me survive the ordeal.Whether I can survive Barron’s infamous seductive charm is another question. When our fiery animosity turns into a different type of fire altogether, will either of us know how to handle it?This book contains: Enemies-to-friends-to-lovers, slow-burn energy, almost-fake dating, fake not-dating, and some steamy scenes in luxurious locations.
author: Elle Sharpe
